metadata.title: CVE-2023-0841 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in GPAC2.3-DEV-rev40-g3602a5ded. This issue affects the function mp3_dmx_processof the file filters/reframe_mp3.c. The manipulation leads to heap-basedbuffer overflow. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has beendisclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifier of thisvulnerability is VDB-221087.

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
